emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Software Development Lifecycle
emerging_technologies.description: AI tools that manage the entire software development process, from coding to deployment, with minimal human intervention.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces human error, increases efficiency, but could lead to job displacement in traditional coding roles.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High demand for faster, error-free software development; resistance from traditional developers; need for retraining.

emerging_technologies.name: Autonomous Urban Transport System
emerging_technologies.description: Fully autonomous transport systems for urban environments, reducing congestion and improving safety.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Decreases traffic accidents, increases urban mobility, but requires infrastructure overhaul and public acceptance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Government policies, infrastructure readiness, public trust in autonomous systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Interface for Cognitive Enhancement
emerging_technologies.description: Interfaces that enhance cognitive functions by directly interacting with the brain, aiding learning and memory.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for increased productivity and learning capacity, but raises ethical concerns about privacy and equity.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Ethical considerations, regulatory approval, technological maturity.

emerging_technologies.name: Space-based Solar Power
emerging_technologies.description: Collecting solar power in space and beaming it back to Earth to provide clean, unlimited energy.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Offers a sustainable energy solution, but involves high initial costs and geopolitical considerations.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological breakthroughs in energy transmission, international cooperation.

emerging_technologies.name: Blockchain-Enhanced Digital Identity
emerging_technologies.description: Using blockchain to create secure, verifiable digital identities for both individuals and entities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves online security and reduces identity theft, but requires widespread adoption and trust in blockchain technology.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Privacy concerns, regulatory environment, need for interoperability between systems.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Personal Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI assistants capable of handling complex tasks, personal scheduling, and learning user preferences.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in both consumer and enterprise settings, with continuous improvements in functionality.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart Grids
mainstream_technologies.description: Integration of renewable energy sources with advanced control mechanisms for efficient energy distribution.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in developed nations, with significant investment in infrastructure.

epoch_themes.description: A focus on technologies that automate human tasks and enhance human capabilities.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shift in workforce dynamics, potential for increased productivity, and ethical debates on human enhancement.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased investment in AI research, discussions on AI ethics, and the rise of cognitive enhancement technologies.

epoch_themes.description: Technologies aimed at sustainable living and expanding human presence beyond Earth.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes environmental consciousness and opens new economic frontiers in space.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global push for renewable energy, space exploration, and sustainable urban planning.

epoch_themes.description: Enhancement of digital infrastructure to ensure privacy, security, and trust in online interactions.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Reduces fraud, enhances security, but also brings challenges in managing digital rights and privacy.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased regulatory frameworks for digital security, growth in blockchain applications.
